about_the_game:
This is the second puzzle in the futuristic collection Space Empire and it's named Battlegroup Selcior. The amazing illustration that was used to create it was made by Christian Hecker.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in HD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. It's a balanced illustration with many details and some challenging areas. It should provide a medium challenge to most players.

If you like the art, make sure to check the other puzzle boxes in the collection Space Empire. You won't be disappointed.
